data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Soroca to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Soroca, Moldova
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 55,059 people in the state of Soroca who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Soroca, Moldova a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Soroca, Moldova.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 15 new simple churches in the state of Soroca, Moldova. Place a simple church in every community of the 77,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Soroca with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,588 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Soroca, Moldova has a population of 77,700.

We estimate Soroca has 3,588 people who might know Jesus, 55,059 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,052 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
